'''Beggar Wifruth''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Beggar Wifruth is the captain of a low-class Principi ship.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Wifruth captains ''[The Scuttler](/theScuttler/)'', a dhow flying the Príncipi flag. She attacks you on the world map.
}}

[Category:Príncipi sen Patrena characters](/categoryPrincipiSenPatrenaCharacters/)
